description: Meet new recruit Danny. He's a lanky guy, standing 5'11' tall and weighing 165 lbs. He's from Alabama and likes to hunt, fish and work on cars. (A 'good country boy' our guest director Mike says.)Danny says he's a 'little bit' nervous to jerk off in front of the camera, which is refreshing and cute. Danny reminds me a little bit of the guys that Active Duty first had on the site, so many years ago. Men that were nervous about doing this, but clearly wanted to experiment a little.Danny's a good looking guy, with a big smile, dark hair and a pretty nice body. While he's a little hesitant about the whole set-up, he still puts on a nice little War Chest show for us.Mike asks, is this 'first time you ever jacked off in front of a guy?' To find out Danny's answer to that question, and this one: 'Think I can get you to come back?,' you'll have to watch the scene!
title: Danny
